src_original: iti dharmopamā sākṣāt tulyadharmapradarśanāt // DKd_2.15 //
rājīvam iva te vaktraṃ netre nīlotpale iva &
iyaṃ pratīyamānaikadharmā vastūpamaiva sā // DKd_2.16 //
tgt_original: iti dharmopamānāma tulyadharmanidarśanāt ||  dhammahīnāmukhambhojasadisaṃ munino' iti |

src_original: tvadānanam ivonnidram aravindam abhūd iti &
tavānanam ivāmbhojam ambhojam iva te mukham &
ity anyonyopamā seyam anyonyotkarṣaśaṃsinī // DKd_2.18 //

tvanmukhaṃ kamalenaiva tulyaṃ nānyena kena cit &  ity anyasāmyavyāvṛtter iyaṃ sā niyamopamā // DKd_2.19 //  padmaṃ tāvat tavānveti mukham anyac ca tādṛśam &  asti ced astu tatkārīty asāv aniyamopamā // DKd_2.20 //  samuccayopamāpy asti na kāntyaiva mukhaṃ tava &

hlādanākhyena cānveti karmaṇendum itīdṛśī // DKd_2.21 //  tvayy eva tvanmukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate divi candramāḥ &  iyaty eva bhidā nānyety asāv atiśayopamā // DKd_2.22 //  mayy evāsyā mukahśrīr ity alam indor vikatthanaiḥ &  padme 'pi sā yad asty evety asāv utprekṣitopamā // DKd_2.23 //
yadi kiṃ cid bhavet padmaṃ subhru vibhrāntalocanam &

tat te mukhaśriyaṃ dhattām ity asāv adbhutopamā // DKd_2.24 //  śaśīty utprekṣya tanvaṅgi tvanmukhaṃ tvanmukhāśayā &  indum apy anudhāvāmīty eṣā mohopamā smṛtā // DKd_2.25 //  kiṃ padmam antarbhrāntāli kiṃ te lolekṣaṇaṃ mukham &  mama dolāyate cittam itīyaṃ saṃśayopamā // DKd_2.26 //
na padmasyendunigrāhyasyendulajjākarī dyutiḥ &  atas tvanmukham evedam ity asau nirṇayopamā // DKd_2.27 //
tgt_original: sugandhisobhasampatti sasi raṃsuvirodhi ca |  mukhaṃ tavambujaṃ veti sā silesopamā matā || 161 ||

src_original: śiśirāṃśupratspardhi śrīmat surabhigandhi ca &
ambhojam iva te vaktram iti śleṣopamā smṛtā // DKd_2.28 //  sarūpaśabdavācyatvāt sā samānopamā yathā &
tgt_original: mukhaṃ tavāmbujamiva sā hi śleṣopamāmatā ||  sarūpasaddavāccatta sā santānopamā yathā |

src_original: bālevodyānamāleyaṃ sālakānanaśobhinī // DKd_2.29 //
brahmaṇo 'py udbhavaḥ padmaś candraḥ śaṃbhuśirodhṛtaḥ &  tau tulyau tvanmukheneti sā praśaṃsopamocyate // DKd_2.31 //  candreṇa tvanmukhaṃ tulyam ity ācikhyāsu me manaḥ &
tgt_original: 'bālāgya dyānamāleyaṃ sālakānanaśobhinī ||  khayi cando bahurajaṃ padumaṃ tehi te mukhaṃ |

src_original: śatapatraṃ śaraccandras tvadānanam iti trayam &
tgt_original: kṣayī candro bahurajaḥ padmaṃ tābhyāṃ tu te mukhaṃ |

src_original: na jātu śaktir indos te mukhena pratigarjitum &
mṛgekṣaṇāṅkaṃ te vaktraṃ mṛgeṇaivāṅkitaḥ śaśī &
tathāpi sama evāsau notkarṣīti caṭūpamā // DKd_2.35 //
na padmaṃ mukham evedaṃ na bhṛṅgau cakṣuṣī ime &
iti vispaṣṭasādṛśyāt tattvākhyānopamaiva sā // DKd_2.36 //
candrāravindayoḥ kāntim atikramya mukhaṃ tava &
pratibimbapraticchandasarūpasamasaṃmitāḥ &
tgt_original: kacchaṃ vigāhate tassa tamanmetyanubandhati |  taṃ sīlaṃ yaṃ nisedheti tassa cānukkāroti me || 185 ||

src_original: salakṣaṇasadṛkṣābhasapakṣopamitopamāḥ // DKd_2.59 //  kalpadeśīyadeśyādiḥ prakhyapratinidhī api &  savarṇatulitau śabdau ye cānyūnārthavādinaḥ // DKd_2.60 //
tgt_original: ivādayaḥ ivaṃvātulyasamānanibhasannibhāḥ |  yathā saṃkāsa tulitāḥ prakāśaratirūpakāḥ ||  saddaksaddakṣāḥ saṃvādi virodhi saddaśāstathā |

src_original: spardhate jayati dveṣṭi druhyati pratigarjati // DKd_2.61 //  ākrośaty avajānāti kadarthayati nindati &  viḍambayati saṃdhatte hasatīrṣyaty asūyati // DKd_2.62 //  tasya muṣṇāti saubhāgyaṃ tasya kāntiṃ vilumpati &
tgt_original: jayatyavakrośati ca hāsaṃ ca parigacchati |  duṣyatyasūyatyavajānāti nindatīrṣyati rūndhati ||  tasya corayati saubhāgyaṃ tasyakānti vilumpati |

src_original: tena sārdhaṃ vigṛhṇāti tulāṃ tenādhirohati // DKd_2.63 //  tatpadavyāṃ padaṃ dhatte tasya kakṣāṃ vigāhate &
